website_summaries.verdict: This Mr. Potato Head has the star power kids will love – the one to get for fans of Toy Story 3.
pros: Potato Head with pieces that create the look from the popular Disney movie Toy Story 4
cons: Lacking the eyebrows the character has in the movie

customer_reviews.title: This is great for any fan of Toy Story!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about him is perfect and the box is really nice and colorful! The accessories are easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Family

customer_reviews.title: Barely accurate to the films
customer_reviews.text: The only accurate things about him are the hat, eyes, nose, and stache. Had to draw eyebrows on.... you’d think after so long they’d finally release a movie accurate durable version of Potato Head, with at least his separate eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Andiana

customer_reviews.title: Cool, but Returned it
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were so difficult to remove. I struggled to get the pieces out. So I returned it & bought the Mrs.Poato head, and she so easy to use. My toddler loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Christel D. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointing
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grand son based on our experience with the original version we got for his parent. The parts are difficult to place on the body (kind of sticky and not smooth). Also, parts do not seem to be well designed for placement at different positions easily. A storage location for the parts inside the body would have also been useful.
customer_reviews.author: Fred E

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: A bit more expensive than some of the other potato heads, but it's absolutely worth it. It's one of the closest replicas to Mr. Potato Head in the movie. I'm sure my child will love it.
customer_reviews.author: KaitLynn

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so excited when he received this! I was a little nervous to give it to him because he’s a car, truck and transformer guy, but he loved creating different faces, and his vivid imagination was so fun to watch with Mr potato head! He is 5 years old
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bullock

customer_reviews.title: A classic toy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Mr Potato head is a classic. Loved it when I was a kid and my grandkids love it too. We all have fun playing with it. My 2 yr old granddaughter got the larger set for Christmas and it’s non stop fun for her.
customer_reviews.author: SandyD

customer_reviews.title: Adorable toy
customer_reviews.text: This toy was perfect for a gift. My daughter love Toy Story 4 and all the characters in it. Mr. And Mrs. Potato head are some adorable characters and very fun toys to play with. I will continue to collect the characters/toys and just extend the Toy Story Family.
customer_reviews.author: Tiarra J

customer_reviews.title: Not good design
customer_reviews.text: Are these reviews fake?! The glasses do not even fit over the ears!! Many of the pieces do not fit very well. This is not like the Mr Potato Head of yesteryear. You have to really question some Amazon reviews these days. My toddler still plays with this potato head, but she is not able to put the pieces in the holes. It is just badly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Lightfoot

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: Cute little toy! Bought for our son, and he absolutely loves it. Parts are easy for him to pull our and rearrange, and conveniently stores in the back of Mr. Potato Head!
customer_reviews.author: BohnertFam

customer_reviews.title: Same as in Toy Story
customer_reviews.text: Same Mr. Potatohead as in Toy Story. There are a few differences from the original Mr. Potatohead and this has all the same as he does in the movies. My son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lala Sears

customer_reviews.title: Great for TS lovers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11 year old who requested this, YES! he requested this for whatever reason LOL. He was happy to get it and actually plays with it.
customer_reviews.author: HardCayndae

customer_reviews.title: Good for play and collection
customer_reviews.text: My son has a huge collection and loved this one. They changed some of the pieces just enough so they are unique to even big collectors.
customer_reviews.author: Procussionist

customer_reviews.title: Great Reward!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect "Reward" for a student who LOVES "Toy Story"! Thank you for making it affordable for teachers!
customer_reviews.author: R. Rosenbalm

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Great Potato Head toy. My toddler loves it. It comes with enough accessories to keep him entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W

customer_reviews.title: Interesting toy
customer_reviews.text: My little one (two years old) loves this potato head. I think it’s a super cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan Bashir

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I got this to work with students that need to learn to request items. It works perfectly, for that and for learning body parts too.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this beautiful potato face will be hours of happiness for your children.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter - I’m sure she will be very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for small children that like Toy Story. The color is a little off on some of the features but it isn't something a toddler will notice.
customer_reviews.author: michael james malone

customer_reviews.title: Toy for a fan
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my niece, I’m sure she’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: SweetCupcake

customer_reviews.title: Great toy story toy!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect birthday gift for my son and decoration for his toy story themed party!
customer_reviews.author: MisterandMizz

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Our nephew is obsessed with Toy Story, so this made a great 2nd birthday gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Its great.
customer_reviews.text: I love the toy I got for myself I keep on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Great Mr. Potato Head!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Mr. Potato Head for my son’s Toy Story collection. He loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Tania

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly the same as the Mr. Potato Head in Toy Story movies!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hellobaby

customer_reviews.title: Good but a little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I’m a little disappointed with this product. The ears don’t stay in place very well and are always falling out. The glasses are a little small/short and fall off when my 3 year old is playing with him. But he likes this toy a lot. I just wish it would stay out longer.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, Not Good.
customer_reviews.text: Not movie accurate, but got some custom eyebrows glued to the eyes that made it better. From what I'm used to seeing from Hasbro, this is the closest they've ever been to being movie accurate, which is a bit of a let down, but for the price, it's not the end of the world.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We love our Mr. Potato head! It’s a good buy and the only thing I could complain about it the glasses don’t always stay on, but that’s no big deal for all the ways you can change it up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young kids
customer_reviews.text: I sent this to a teacher for her kindergarten class. The kids loved playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift!
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the one in the movie! Great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Rosario

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The toys match the movie. Good products but some of the pieces are a bit hard to pull off and put back in. Overall good quality and super cute. My cousin loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Just like the movie. All pieces are easy to use/change.
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Wyman

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for your little one!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this toy! Keeps him busy! The pieces are great. It’s a little hard to push in and pull off for for him. But he never sticks them all the wAy on anyways. Def recommend for your little one!
customer_reviews.author: juan montoya

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves this toy. Taking Mr. Potatoe apart and putting him back together.
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA MADRID

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: This toy has been sturdy to withstand a 3 year old. He loves making different faces.
customer_reviews.author: Drammaw

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it and keeps them busy. I’m very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jvidales

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift for my grandson. He loves toy story. As pictured, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nanette Soto

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it and it has withstood toddler play! Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki  Laitres

customer_reviews.title: Good toy
customer_reviews.text: I love Mr. potato head! It looks like a real movie potato head !
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy story toy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it. Brings toy with him everywhere he goes.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: not at all like the picture
customer_reviews.text: It did not come as in the original Mr potato head its literally like the playskool one. No mustache no anything it is smiling with big poped out eyes and It is also dressed like woody. Not at all accurate to the description.
customer_reviews.author: ximena

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun for play
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves this toy! Durable and fun for play!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have it!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my sons 4th birthday! He was happy it was sold out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I just received my Mr Potato Head expecting g to use it with my preschool class only to find it was missing an arm very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: This Mr. potatoes head is AWESOME! My son loves it. It’s resembles the toy story character perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Great product value for money great for toy story collectors and kids
customer_reviews.text: Came on time brilliant packaging love this product complete value for money

customer_reviews.title: Mr. Potato Head Delivers Fun Yet Again
customer_reviews.text: Mr. Potato head brought back such memories. All the accessories are good quality. Provided hours of fun for little ones.
customer_reviews.author: A.G.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my sons bday, he is obsessed with Toy Story.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son just loves it!!!! Bought with Mrs. Potatohead and he has all the toys from Toy Story and now plays like Andy!

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like ur business
customer_reviews.text: I received the Item I’m not happy about it, there is only one arm with this toy why is that so? What should I do with one arm potato head?
customer_reviews.author: nazira

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: This was my sons favorite Christmas present and it has gone everywhere with us. Me. Potato head is a classic toy any child would love.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Not much different that what I remember as a kid
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this and plays wit it non stop when he’s over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting the entire product intact that i pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The toy is for my 2 year old son. It was just delivered and upon opening it the Toy is missing an arm.
customer_reviews.author: natasha

customer_reviews.title: One arm?
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS TOY! Mine came with one arm. I got both arms as a kid. I suppose this is a statement about our world today........sad
customer_reviews.author: Greg M.

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves it. He was in need of a new Mr. Potatoes Head and this one is perfect. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: Great for a 2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old niece loves this toy! Super easy to use even for a 2 year old who is still developing fine motor skills!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Canales

customer_reviews.title: Missing arm
customer_reviews.text: Came with one missing arm. Not happy about this since I was excited to use this to help my son label parts. At least I have the other arm.
customer_reviews.author: MeccaMan

customer_reviews.title: America
customer_reviews.text: Two year old loves it! Now if I can find his arms!!!!

customer_reviews.title: we love it but- the hole in the mouth does not feet correctly to the round parts
customer_reviews.text: we love it but- the hole in the mouth does not feet correctly to the round parts

customer_reviews.title: Worth your purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality toy! I appreciate the paint/color is spot on with the pieces.

customer_reviews.title: Waas what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift my grand son loved. Bought two more for my great nephew.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for anyone who like the Toy Story movie's

customer_reviews.text: My Mr Potato Head toy showed up with only one arm! Super bummed :(

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to the Toy Story toys we already have! So much fun to make funny faces.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Parts are really hard to fit. The compartment led never closes and easily snaps out. Had to put tape on it to keep it closed.

product_meta.title: Mr Potato Head Disney/Pixar Toy Story 4 Classic Mr. Figure Toy for Kids Ages 2 & Up
product_meta.description:
Size:Original versionYour favorite Spud meets Hollywood! Inspired by his character in the Disney/Pixar toy story movies, This classic Mr. Potato Head figure comes with accessories that helped make him a wild and wacky Star. Kids can have so much fun when they mix and mash the parts and pieces to create Mr. Potato Head or their own fun character. Put his tongue where an ear should be, put his eyes where his mouth should be…and don't forget his glasses and silly mustache. This kids' Toy is a great way for them to let their imaginations roam as they imagine their favorite scenes from the toy story movies, and discover endless creative possibilities! The Mr. Potato Head toy includes a potato body and base, and 14 accessories, All sized right for little hands. Most parts are compatible with other Mr. Potato Head and Mrs. Potato Head toys (Each sold separately).

hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Inspired by Disney/Pixar toy story 4 character: This Mr. Potato Head toy is inspired by the beloved character as seen in the Disney/Pixar toy story 4 movie
Sized right for little hands: kids ages 2 and up can have a spudtastic time when they mix and mash the pieces to style Mr. Potato Head or create their own wacky looks

Endless creative possibilities: with 15+ pieces included, kids will love creating Mr. Potato Head and other funny characters. When mixing and mashing the parts and pieces, There is no wrong way to play
Most parts work with other Mr Potato Head toys: most parts are compatible with other Mr. Potato Head and Mrs. Potato Head toys. (Each sold separately.)

specifications.Included Components: Includes 1 potato body, 1 base, and 9 accessories.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,484 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
